data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Lipkovo, North Macedonia to be faithful with what they have been given, whether a little or a lot.
data.verse: Everyone to whom much was given, of him much will be required, and from him to whom they entrusted much, they will demand the more.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Lipkovo, North Macedonia
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Lipkovo that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, all authority was given to you, and you commanded all disciples in Lipkovo, North Macedonia to make more disciples, and you promised to be with them. May your power and their obedience make more disciples today.
data.verse: All authority in heaven and on earth has been given to me. Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age.

data.prayer: Spirit, cause the 5 believers in Lipkovo to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Albanian, Macedonian people might believe through him.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 2,700 people living in Lipkovo, North Macedonia. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Lipkovo, North Macedonia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.section_summary:
the state of Lipkovo, North Macedonia has a population of 2,700.

We estimate Lipkovo has 5 people who might know Jesus, 1,669 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,027 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 540 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Lipkovo, North Macedonia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.
